mapper.insert: insert into racetype_info (racetype) select '${racetype}' from dual where not exists (select * from racetype_info where racetype='${racetype}')
insert into roundtype_info (roundtype) select '${roundtype}' from dual where not exists (select * from roundtype_info where roundtype='${roundtype}')
insert into progression_info (progression) select '${progression}' from dual where not exists (select * from progression_info where progression='${progression}')
insert into team_info (team_name) select '${value}' from dual where not exists (select * from team_info where team_name='${value}')

mapper.select: select team_name,team_num from team_info where team_num in ( select team_num from record_info group by team_num ) order by team_name
select roundtype_key,roundtype from roundtype_info where roundtype_key in ( select roundtype_key from race_info group by roundtype_key )
select distinct year(race_date) from race_info order by race_date asc

select race_info.race_num from race_info where (race_info.race_date between '${start_date}' and '${end_date}') and (race_info.roundtype_key in (${roundtype_key})) and (race_num in (select race_num from record_info where team_num=${team_num}))

select event_name,race_date, (select roundtype from roundtype_info where roundtype_key= (select roundtype_key from race_info where race_num='${race_num}')) as roundtype,
(select progression from progression_info where progression_key= (select progression_key from race_info where race_num='${race_num}')) as progression,
(select racetype from racetype_info where racetype_key= (select racetype_key from race_info where race_num='${race_num}')) as racetype,
(select team_name from team_info where team_num=${team_num}) as team_name,
(select rank from record_info where team_num=${team_num} and race_num=${race_num}) as rank,
(select race_time from record_info where team_num=${team_num} and race_num=${race_num}) as race_time
from race_info where (race_num='${race_num}')

select event_name,roundtype,racetype,progression,rank,race_time from race_info join record_info on race_info.race_num=record_info.race_num join roundtype_info on race_info.roundtype_key=roundtype_info.roundtype_key join racetype_info on race_info.racetype_key=racetype_info.racetype_key join progression_info on race_info.progression_key=progression_info.progression_key where race_info.race_num in ( select race_num from record_info where team_num=${value}) and record_info.team_num=${value}

select count(*) from record_info join race_info on record_info.race_num=race_info.race_num join progression_info on race_info.progression_key=progression_info.progression_key where team_num=${value} and rank=1 and race_info.progression_key= (select progression_key from progression_info where progression='결승')
select avg(rank) from record_info where team_num=${value} and race_time not in ('실격','기권')
select sec_to_time(avg(time_to_sec(race_time))) from record_info where team_num=${value} and race_time not in ('실격','기권')
